Description: Palo Alto Networks AppFramework PlayGround with API Explorer

Label.default: Advanced Configuration - Windows Active Directory Configuration

BootstrapBucketName.Description: S3 Bucket name for FW bootstrap configuration (i.e. myappframeworkbucket-ngfw)

BootstrapBucketRegion.Description: S3 Region where the FW bootstrap bucket is located

EnvironmentBucketName.Description: Bucket name for non-Firewall configuration (i.e. myappframeworkbucket-conf)

EnvironmentPrivateKeyFile.Description: Private Key File with Path in the Environment Configuration S3 Bucket (i.e. keys/paloalto.pem)

ADTemplateFile.Description: CloudFormation Template Path for Windows Domain Controller deployment

ServerKeyName.Description: Name of an existing EC2 KeyPair to enable SSH access to VMs. Except NGFW and Panorama

PanoramaNGFWKeyName.Description: Name of an existing EC2 KeyPair to enable SSH access to NGFW and Panorama

AdminPassword.Description: Password for API Explorer, NGFW/Panorama admin, VMs ec2-user/ubuntu users (SSH password auth enabled), Windows DC admin and users. Must be at least 8 characters containing letters, numbers and symbols

PanoramaSerial.Description: Panorama Serial Number (provided by Palo Alto Networks)

AppHostedZone.Description: DNS Domain Name or Route53 Hosted Zone Name (i.e. panwlab.mycompany.com)

FirewallCertURL.Description: Firewall SSL Certificate URL for Decryption

DomainNetBIOSName.Description: NetBIOS name of the domain (up to 15 characters) for users of earlier versions of Windows (i.e. PANWDOMAIN)

ConfigureRoute53.Description: Dynamically map hostnames to EIPs using Route53?

APIExplorerLetsEncryptCert.Description: Create Letsencrypt certificate for API Explorer? (REQUIRES Route53 DNS Configuration to be enabled)

LetsEncryptEmail.Description: Email address to provide to Letsencrypt for API Explorer SSL certificate generation (i.e. user@mycompany.com)

ADServer1InstanceType.Description: Amazon EC2 instance type for the Windows Domain Controller instance

ADServer1NetBIOSName.Description: NetBIOS name of the Windows Server (up to 15 characters)

DomainAdminUser.Description: User name for the account that will be added as Domain Administrator. This is separate from the default "Administrator" account

DomainDNSName.Description: Fully qualified domain name (FQDN) of the AD root domain (i.e. panwdomain.local)

QSS3BucketName.ConstraintDescription: Quick Start bucket name can include numbers, lowercase letters, uppercase letters, and hyphens (-). It cannot start or end with a hyphen (-).
QSS3BucketName.Description: S3 bucket name for the Quick Start assets. Quick Start bucket name can include numbers, lowercase letters, uppercase letters, and hyphens (-). It cannot start or end with a hyphen (-).

QSS3KeyPrefix.ConstraintDescription: Quick Start key prefix can include numbers, lowercase letters, uppercase letters, hyphens (-), and forward slash (/).
QSS3KeyPrefix.Description: S3 key prefix for the Quick Start assets. Quick Start key prefix can include numbers, lowercase letters, uppercase letters, hyphens (-), and forward slash (/).

RestoreModePassword.Description: Password for a separate Administrator account when the domain controller is in Restore Mode. Must be at least 8 characters containing letters, numbers and symbols

WebGenConfURL.Description: Web Traffic Generator Configuration File Path

Fn::Join: cd apiexplorer-docker && docker-compose build --build-arg APPEIP=${APPEIP} --build-arg APPFQDN=${APPFQDN}

if [[ $APIEXPLORERLETSENCRYPTCERT == 'true' ]]; then docker run --rm -v apiexplorer-docker_certs:/etc/ssl/certs -v apiexplorer-docker_nginx-www:/usr/share/nginx certbot/certbot certonly --webroot --deploy-hook /etc/ssl/certs/copy_certs.sh -w /usr/share/nginx/html -d ${APPFQDN} -n --agree-tos --email ${LETSENCRYPTEMAIL} --renew-by-default; docker restart $(docker ps --filter name=apiexplorer-docker_nginx -q); fi
pip3.6 install pandevice paramiko boto3 pan-python
export URLENCODEDPWD=$(/usr/bin/python3 -c 'import sys, urllib.parse as ul; print(ul.quote_plus(sys.argv[1]))' "${ADMINPWD}")

Properties.Comment: DNS name for FW Public IP
